participant_1.name: Lena
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and enthusiastic about life, Lena is always looking for new thrills. She's friendly and enjoys sharing her experiences with others.
participant_1.background: i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i'm not a good swimmer at all. i do like watching cooking shows. hello i just moved here from germany.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Mark is a passionate and warm-hearted individual with a deep appreciation for the arts and sports. He has an engaging storytelling style and enjoys sharing his experiences.
participant_2.background: i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i love cats and have two cats. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i have a weakness for vanilla ice cream. my favorite season is winter.

content.text: do you have any hobbies   i really love sky diving   rollercoasters and cooking shows
My hobby is hat collection. I have over 1000 hats. Do you like ice cream?
i collect hats   i have a collection of <num> hats
I like vanilla ice cream. What is best for you?
sounds yummy   watching a adventure action movie and eating some popcorn
I don`t like movie. I like sport. I won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics.
not really sports   but i do enjoy running
i run if i am playing pokemon go or zombie run
Sound funny. Do you like computer games?
that would make it hard to watch game shows
